===Etymology===
In [[s:Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 2#26|Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 2]], [[w:Empress Dowager Dong|Empress Dowager Dong]] designates [[w:Emperor Xian of Han|Prince Xie]] (the future [[w:Emperor Xian of Han|Emperor Xian of Han]]) as the Prince of [[w:Kaifeng|Chenliu]] (an ancient county near modern day [[w:Kaifeng|Kaifeng]])
